function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Socio-economic disparities and vulnerability to infection","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Outbreak spread","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Extended time indoors could lead to increased risk of contagious disease transmission within housing and office spaces.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of travel ban and emergency response leading to 744,000 confirmed covid-19 cases","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of interest from state and federal governments in the u.s.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Presence of rt-qpcr inhibition in wastewater samples","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential for disease transmission through close contact in ridesharing services","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inability to enforce public norms and regulations in heavily dense urban areas","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of personalized experiences leading to customer dissatisfaction and reduced loyalty.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Disparities in results due to differences in suspension media for virus studies","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exclusion of certain career groups from teleworking may create disparities and inequalities in access to remote work opportunities.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High concentration of pharmaceutical products in wastewater due to increased demand, posing challenges for old age wastewater risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Observing social change without clear action plan","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on skewed data for
